tool_description: This is a data centric API which pulls all the reviews (both text and video) from across the web of credit card knife.
name: KnowYourKnife
title: KnowYourKnife

api_list.name: creditcardknife
api_list.description: API to pull credit card knife reviews from the Internet
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zaccaryjae-knowyourknife-v1.p.rapidapi.com/creditcardknife"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zaccaryjae-knowyourknife-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://zaccaryjae-knowyourknife-v1.p.rapidapi.com/creditcardknife"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zaccaryjae-knowyourknife-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
